CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE ORDINANCES
modified
This table gives the location within this Code of those ordinances adopted since the 1953 Code, which are included herein. Ordinances adopted prior to 1952 were incorporated into the 1953 Code. Ordinances not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded or not of a general and permanent nature.
EXPAND
